text: Awesome momos (dumplings), got steamed and fried. Both are delicious!! Located on Evans just east of the 427, this place is quaint with a few tables. Saw many people come and go for take out. Highly recommended!
Had a craving today to have momos, tea, and thukpa after a long time, and I am so glad I found this place! Good food, nice ambience, and good service. Highly recommended....
Yummy food and nice waitress and price is good too!! Will come back again! Veggie noodles.
